body: Hi Aurelien, I would customize the occupancy schedule. Create a new schedule with the values of the occupancy file with a function that substitute the values=0 (when there is no occupancy) for the amount that you need. You can always calculate this value by inputting a fraction of the ventilation per area or per person, as suits you. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3oOh0daNY6Nib5L6TXS0Br0A6Bc-qQoY1G-R-ziRzfRxoDoKw8jzpHhsFt7rhr9ZLbhkpuzxi3LwR0yglG2D4OM9c704i7VZ/schedule.PNG) Hope it helps Julia Edit: keep in mind that the simulation will calculate the ventilation per area/person multiplied by the number of the new schedule (approx to explain it in a simple way, hope Mostapha doesn't kill me for saying that), so be very careful with the numbers that you put there
